en.A Wild that lands will drop down to the: A Wild that lands will drop down to the bottom position and will increase a payout multiplier for every step it drops, then expand to cover the entire reel. Together with xWays symbol the payout multiplier can increase to x6. A xNudge Wild may land on reel 2 to 5.
en.Multiple consecutive xNudge Wild multipl: Multiple consecutive xNudge Wild multipliers are added up to a total win multiplier. Example: x3+x1=x4.
en.A Wild symbol substitutes for any symbol: A Wild symbol substitutes for any symbol except Scatter symbol.
en.A mystery symbol that can hold 2 to 3 of: A mystery symbol that can hold 2 to 3 of the same symbol inside and will expand the reels.
en.xWays symbols can land on all reels and: xWays symbols can land on all reels and expand a reel up to 6 symbols high. Multiple xWays symbols may land during one spin.
en.Reels may be expanded up to 46656 win wa: Reels may be expanded up to 46656 win ways.
en.The bonus mode is activated by 3 Scatter: The bonus mode is activated by 3 Scatter symbols and awards 10 Resurrection Spins. Any additional Scatter symbols awards 3 additional Resurrection Spins.
en.Minimum of one xWays symbol is guarantee: Minimum of one xWays symbol is guaranteed on each initial cascade in the bonus mode.
en.In Resurrection Spins every fourth winni: In Resurrection Spins every fourth winning cascade will turn one of the five dead legends into Wilds for the rest of the bonus round and award +2 extra spins.
en.Any win on the highest paying symbol wil: Any win on the highest paying symbol will award +1x multiplier on that symbol. Winning cascades on only the highest paying symbol will not count for turning the symbols to Wilds, but only towards the multiplier increase.
en.At the cost of 3 times the base bet, the: At the cost of 3 times the base bet, the player is more than 5 times likely to activate Resurrection Spins.
en.May the dead rise again, just one more t: May the dead rise again, just one more time...
en.Cascading reels: Any winning symbols wil: Cascading reels: Any winning symbols will explode and be removed and let new symbols fall into place which may award additional wins.
en.5 times more likely to trigger Resurrect: 5 times more likely to trigger Resurrection Spins.
en.The max payout of the game is 27000 time: The max payout of the game is 27000 times the base bet.
en.When the total win exceeds this amount t: When the total win exceeds this amount the game round will end and 27000 times the base bet is awarded.
en.The theoretical return to the player for: The theoretical return to the player for 10 Resurrection Spins feature buy is -3%.
The theoretical return to the player for 13 Resurrection Spins feature buy is -4%.
The theoretical return to the player for 16 Resurrection Spins feature buy is -5%.
The theoretical return to the player for Lucky Draw feature buy is -6%.
The theoretical return to the player for xBet is -2%.
en.The Crypt is a video slot with the follo: The Crypt is a video slot with following feature(s):
en.The payout for each symbol is not affect: The payout for each symbol is not affected.
en.At the cost of 3 times the base bet, the: At the cost of 3 times the base bet, the player is
en.more than 5 times likely to activate Res: more than 5 times likely to activate Resurrection Spins.
en.Up to 46656 win ways when xWays symbol e: Up to 46656 win ways when xWays symbol expands (see pay table for more info).
en.A 6-reel, up to 6-row reel with 15 symbo: A 6-reel, up to 6-row reel with 15 symbols and cascading reels.
en.4096 win ways by default (see pay table: 4096 win ways by default (see pay table for more info).
